title: What's The Outlook For Nigerian Girls Kidnapped By Boko Haram?
teaser: Renee Montagne talks with former U.S. Ambassador to Nigeria John Campbell for an update on the 200 Nigerian schoolgirls kidnapped in April by the extremist group Boko Haram.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
